title: Fizz Wins E-Week!
description:
Over the last week we've demonstrated beyond any doubt what every one of us knew all along, and what others have long feared - that Engineering Physics is the best engineering department on campus. And perhaps, the universe.

Congratulations to everyone involved in making this happen, especially our wonderful E-Week rep, Coleman and thank you to everyone who participated!

title: PP Upsets FilmFEUSt
description:
This year's competition for E-Week was especially close with great films from Fizz, IGEN and Mining but the show was stolen by the first years who put together a cinematic masterpiece. There is indeed life and talent in the next generation of engineers.

Check it out here!

title: New Website!
description: After many long years of mediocrity, the Fizz website has been completely redesigned! A huge thank you to everyone involved in making this project happen. Feel free to send any website related feedback to the IT Manager.
